attributes.action: give a legally binding undertaking to the people of this country that in view of the forecast of underfunding in the NHS by the year 2011 (as made yesterday by the Federation of NHS Managers) that the first cut to be made will be the refusal of treatment to foreigners who arrive in the country with the prime intention of the theft of medical treatment from the people who have to pay for it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Foreigners continue to flood into this country to be treated by NHS medical facilities which are paid for by the taxpayer, who are then deprived of treatment through NICE policies, and it is these people who shold be the first group which are cut off from treatment if reductions in expenditure are required.  All that is required is that incomers to the country are treated in the same manner as that which people from this country are treated when they go to the country the incomer comes from!
